fund_created.subtitle_header_text: You are investing in the crypto world
fund_created.description_text: We have already created your fund and our robot will start managing your capital based on the information you set up.

fund_name.title: Name your fund
fund_name.text_before: It can be what you want, it is simply so that you can identify it within our application.

header_info.title: Choose your favorite strategy
header_info.description: Each strategy has different returns and volatility. Choose the one that best suits you.

volume_profile_strategies_USDT.title: Denali
volume_profile_strategies_USDT.description: Let our algorithm trade for you. We operate all of your crypto and when your investment is finished it will be converted to USDT (Theter).
volume_profile_strategies_USDT.info_description: Denali is a low risk investment strategy, which makes it ideal for people who are just starting out or who want to ensure the controlled growth of their investment. Its objective is to generate returns in dollars (Tether or USDT). It works by applying different strategies on each crypto that it operates. In short, use dollars to generate more dollars. Its annual yield is around 17%

volume_profile_strategies_BTC.title: Olympus Mons
volume_profile_strategies_BTC.description: Generate more Bitcoins with your cryptos. We operate all of your crypto and when your investment is finished it will be converted to BTC (Bitcoin).
volume_profile_strategies_BTC.info_description: Olympus mons is an investment strategy with a low risk, which makes it ideal for people who are just starting out or who want to ensure controlled growth of their investment. Its objective is to generate returns in Bitcoins. It works by applying different strategies on each crypto that it operates.

DeFi_index.title: Himalayas
DeFi_index.description: Invest in the 5 projects with the highest market capitalization of decentralized finance. When your investment is finished it will be converted to USDT (Tether).
DeFi_index.info_description:
Himalayas is a high risk investment index.
 An index is the average price of a group of assets. These assets (in the Himalayas) are the 5 cryptocurrencies with the most blocked capital (amount of money invested within a crypto). Himalayas works on the DeFi ecosystem (a decentralized system that is leveraged on real-life financial instruments - such as loans, credits, interest, and the ease of creating markets). In simple words, Himalayas selects the most promising cryptocurrencies within DeFi and updates your portfolio… (portfolio = the coins you have in your wallet…) once a month. In short, this strategy is committed to diversifying within DeFi).

Mary_index.title: Andes
Mary_index.description: Invest in the 5 cryptocurrencies with the largest market capitalization. When your investment is finished, it will be converted into USDT. (Theter)
Mary_index.info_description:
Andes is an investment index with a medium-high risk.
 An index is the average price of a group of assets. These assets (in Andes) are the 5 most important cryptocurrencies (representing 77% of the entire market). Basically, you build an investment portfolio ... (portfolio = the coins you have in your wallet ...) and update it once a month to make sure you have the best 5 assets on the market. In short, this strategy is committed to diversifying.

balance_not_enough.title: You need USD${{minBalance}} in your Binance account to start investing.

no_apikeys_modal.second_title: We discovered that you have not yet linked your account with Binance.
no_apikeys_modal.message: To start investing you need to have a Binance account and link it with your Xcapit account.

fund_duration.title: What will be the duration of your investment fund?
fund_duration.text_before: We will set a duration for your fund to have a beginning and an end, but you can stop it and extract your earnings at any time.
fund_duration.text_help: In short terms, the robot is more likely to have performance problems.

fund_take_profit.title: Set benefit limits
fund_take_profit.text_before: When do you want us to stop investing? Your investment will be finalized when it reaches this profit percentage.
fund_take_profit.manual_stop: I'm going to finish it manually
fund_take_profit.alert_manual_option: Keep in mind that investing without profit limits implies that you must end your investment manually.

fund_stop_loss.title: In case of loss, until what percentage of your capital are you willing to risk?
fund_stop_loss.text_before: Once this percentage is reached, we will stop the operation of the fund to safeguard your capital.
fund_stop_loss.title_classicSL: Write the % of classic stop loss
fund_stop_loss.message_classicSL: We will stop investing if the investment reaches this loss percentage
fund_stop_loss.title_inteligentSL: Write the % of inteligent stop loss
fund_stop_loss.message_inteligentSL: The stop loss will move this percentage away from the fund's performance
fund_stop_loss.manual_stop: I'm going to finish it manually
fund_stop_loss.alert_manual_option: Keep in mind that investing without limit of losses can cause a significant decrease in the valuation of your capital in USD, however you will have the same amount of cryptocurrencies
fund_stop_loss.inteligent_stop_loss_info: What is a inteligent stop loss?
fund_stop_loss.inteligent_stop_loss_title: How does the smart stop loss work?
fund_stop_loss.inteligent_stop_loss_text: Unlike a classic Stop Loss that remains static in the percentage of loss that you are willing to take, the Inteligent Stop Loss updates and moves a certain percentage away from the performance of the strategy.
fund_stop_loss.inteligent_stop_loss_text1: This Stop Loss option will allow you to more easily capitalize your profits if the strategy generates positive returns but does not end your fund by Take Profit.
fund_stop_loss.inteligent_stop_loss_text2: We recommend using a percentage between 5% and 20%.

fund_success.textSecondary: We have already created your investment and our algorithms will begin to manage your capital based on the information you configured. Make sure you have checked the “enable spot trading” field in Binance so that we can trade.

fund_success_renew.textSecondary: We have already renewed your fund and our robot will start managing your capital based on the information you set up.

fund_card.not_balance_found: There is no balance to show

fund_finish_pause_fund_card.alert_header: You are about to finish your fund
fund_finish_pause_fund_card.alert_message: When you finish your fund all the coins will be passed to your base currency

fund_summary.title: You will invest in:
fund_summary.skip_invest: I don't want to invest yet

run_summary.no_status_text: There is still no status to show for the run
run_summary.profit_text: Percentage of profit in {{days}} days and {{hours}}hs

success_profile.textSecondary: Now we need you to link your Exchange (Binance) to see your capital.

fiscal_data.not_sure_text: If you are not sure you can change this data from your profile later.

interactive_tutorial.t2: Do you have an account in Binance?
interactive_tutorial.t3: Do you know how to transfer your Cryptos to Binance?
interactive_tutorial.no_cryptos_text: The process will take a while, return to the creation of the fund when you are ready!

binance_address_tutorial_modal.t1: Where to find the address to deposit your cryptocurrencies
binance_address_tutorial_modal.p1: Within your Binance account, click on “Funds“, you will find it in the menu that is in the upper right margin.
binance_address_tutorial_modal.p2: In the Funds menu, click on “Deposits”
binance_address_tutorial_modal.p3: In the selector click and write the name of the cryptomoney that you want to know the address (for practical purposes we will look for BTC). In the list that displays click on the name
binance_address_tutorial_modal.p4: Binance will show you a detail of the status of your BTC account, in the field “BTC Deposit Address”, you will find the address. Click on Copy Address and go to your Bitex account and paste the address.
binance_address_tutorial_modal.p5: Keep in mind that this information is important, do not divulge it.

binance_apikey_tutorial_modal.t1: Create APIkey and SECRETkey in Binance
binance_apikey_tutorial_modal.p1: Let’s get your APIkey and SECRETkey. First, once logged into your account, you must search for “API, Creating an API private key provides access to markets and real-time trading services on Binance via a third-party site or application.” and click on API Setting.
binance_apikey_tutorial_modal.p2: You must enter a password before generating your APIkey. This password can be a combination of numbers and characters, the one you like the most, and then click on “Create new password”.
binance_apikey_tutorial_modal.p3: Have your phone near you, Binance will ask for a Google two factor authentication code. Enter the code you get on your phone and then click on “Send”.
binance_apikey_tutorial_modal.p4: Binance will send you an email to the email you registered with. If you don’t see it on your inbox, remember to check the spam folder. Open the email and click on the link they sent you.
binance_apikey_tutorial_modal.p5: Now that your APIkay and SECRETkey are created, save your Secret Key because you won’t see it again. Click on close.
binance_apikey_tutorial_modal.p6: All is left to do is to copy and paste the API Key and Secret Key wherever you want to.
binance_apikey_tutorial_modal.p7: Remember that this is a valuable information and it’s important that you keep it safe, do not send it to third parties that you don’t trust.

binance_check_tutorial_modal.t1: How to verify your Identity in Binance and increase the level of the account to Lv.2
binance_check_tutorial_modal.p1: Open your favorite browser and go to
binance_check_tutorial_modal.p2: Click on sign in, you'll find it in the upper right margin
binance_check_tutorial_modal.p3: Note: if you have trouble loading the data in the form, enter Binance from another browser such as Edge, Chrome or FireFox.
binance_check_tutorial_modal.p4: Once you’ve signed in, click on Lv.
binance_check_tutorial_modal.p5: Click on Personal to verify you as a person.
binance_check_tutorial_modal.p6: You’ll start the verification, click on continue.
binance_check_tutorial_modal.p7: Choose your country of origin and the type of documentation that you are going to validate, it can be your ID, Passport or Driver's License and select on the icon
binance_check_tutorial_modal.p8: You will continue with the Verification by entering the images of your ID, choose how to upload the images of your ID, in this case we will upload the files from the device
binance_check_tutorial_modal.p9: Choose the image that has the front of the DNI and click on Confirm
binance_check_tutorial_modal.p10: Then you must load the image that contains the back of your ID and click on Confirm
binance_check_tutorial_modal.p11: Finally you must upload an image of yourself holding a sheet with the handwriting inscription “Binance - Date Today” and click on Confirm
binance_check_tutorial_modal.p13: When Binance finishes loading the files it will inform you with the following message
binance_check_tutorial_modal.p14: Now you just have to wait for the Binance team to verify your identity and raise the level of your account to Lv.2.
binance_check_tutorial_modal.p15: In case of any error or missing information, Binance will contact you through the e-mail with which you registered. Stay tuned to this medium.

binance_transfer_tutorial_modal.p1: You already have your Bitcoins, so you can now transfer them to Binance so that WCS Advisor can operate.
binance_transfer_tutorial_modal.p2: Within your Bitex account, go to Balances and click Download BTC
binance_transfer_tutorial_modal.p3: Bitex will ask you to enter the address of BTC to which you want to send your BTC, this address is the one that Binance provides you in its platform.
binance_transfer_tutorial_modal.p4: Note: see where to find the address to deposit your BTC in Binance
binance_transfer_tutorial_modal.p5: You must also enter the amount of BTC you want to send and the Google Authentication code and click on Offload
binance_transfer_tutorial_modal.p6: Keep in mind that BTC's shipping operations are carried out from Monday to Friday from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. BTC shipments are subject to network conditions

binance_tutorial_modal.t1: How to create a Binance account
binance_tutorial_modal.p1: Open your favorite browser and go to
binance_tutorial_modal.p2: Click on Register, that your can find in the upper right side of the screen
binance_tutorial_modal.p3: Then you must enter the e-mail with which you want to create your account in Binance, provide a password (it must be at least 6 characters, composed of numbers and letters with at least one uppercase) and confirm the password.
binance_tutorial_modal.p4: In the “Referential ID (optional)“  field you will find the following ID: 36552775, do not change it. If it is empty, enter it.
binance_tutorial_modal.p5: Click on check-box to accept the Binance terms of use and click Register.
binance_tutorial_modal.p6: Note: if you have trouble loading the data in the form, enter Binance from another browser such as Edge, Chrome or FireFox.
binance_tutorial_modal.p7: Binance will send you an email to the email you registered with to confirm it and activate the account.
binance_tutorial_modal.p8: If you can not find it in your inbox, check the Spam folder. Click on the link of the email you received and continue to activate your account.
binance_tutorial_modal.p9: The link will send you to the next page where you must position the puzzle in the right place and prove that you are not a robot.
binance_tutorial_modal.p10: Once you have positioned the puzzle, you have activated your account.
binance_tutorial_modal.p11: When you have the active account, Binance will provide security suggestions for your account, we recommend you check all the options and click continue
binance_tutorial_modal.p12: Binance recommends activating the google two factor authentication. Download the app from playStore, search it as: Google Authentication.
binance_tutorial_modal.p13: Once app is downloaded, click on Next Step and follow the steps.
binance_tutorial_modal.p14: From the app, scan the QR code and click on Next Step
binance_tutorial_modal.p15: Save your password in a paper, and then click on Next Step
binance_tutorial_modal.p16: To end the authentication, enter the access password and the verification code proposed by Authentication Google.
binance_tutorial_modal.p17: If everything is okay, Binance will let you know with the next message, if not, contact Binance for a solution.
binance_tutorial_modal.p18: So far you have created an account in Binance, which in principle does not need to verify your identity to operate, which you can only withdraw up to 2 BTC (Bitcoins) every 24 hours.
binance_tutorial_modal.p19: In case you want to increase the withdrawal limit to 100 BTC for every 24hs, then yes, you must do the verification by clicking on Lv.2 and start with the verification steps. See how to verify your account

ca_tutorial_modal.p1: In order to acquire cryptocurrencies you need a simple and professional platform in which users, regardless of the level of knowledge they have, can after registration, transfer money, buy and sell Bitcoins.
ca_tutorial_modal.p2: We introduce Bitex, since its inception developed business as well as bitcoin exchange market, bitcoin payment gateway and more recently an international corporate remittance service that allows companies to make international payments through local bank transfer, taking advantage of bitcoin technology and allowing companies to make multiple simultaneous payments.
ca_tutorial_modal.p3: We will help you register and activate your account so you can transfer fiduciary money to your Bitex account so that you can obtain your cryptocurrencies.
ca_tutorial_modal.t2: How to create a Bitex Account
ca_tutorial_modal.p4: Open your favorite browser and go to
ca_tutorial_modal.p6: Complete the fields with your email, password, (it must be at least 6 characters, composed of numbers and letters with at least one uppercase), confirm the password and click the checkbox where it says that you are not a US citizen or Dutch and click Register.
ca_tutorial_modal.p7: Note: if you have problems with loading the data in the form, enter bitex from another browser, such as Edge, Chrome or FireFox.
ca_tutorial_modal.p8: You will receive an email from Bitex to confirm the email with which you registered. If you can not find it in your inbox, check the spam folder. Click on the link in the email you received and continue verifying the account.
ca_tutorial_modal.p9: Indicate that you are an individual, not a company.
ca_tutorial_modal.p10: Consider the Bitex requirements to operate locally
ca_tutorial_modal.ul1li1: Valid ID (in color and fully legible)
ca_tutorial_modal.ul1li2: Support of income and savings (last 3 salary receipts or invoices issued in the last month or Declared Jurisdictions of personal assets or profits).
ca_tutorial_modal.p11: Now we will continue with the account verification, remember that all the fields are required, there are four steps:
ca_tutorial_modal.p12: Let’s start with the first step, complete your personal data.
ca_tutorial_modal.p13: There are several fields, here you must upload an image of your ID in front and one on the back, keep in mind that the images have to be clear, in color and not have cuts or areas that can not be read.
ca_tutorial_modal.p14: In step two, you will complete the contact information
ca_tutorial_modal.p15: Here you must upload a phone bill, prepaid or any other service to your name with your current address and click next
ca_tutorial_modal.p16: As a third step, Bitex needs to verify where the money comes from, to do this complete the fields and you must provide a scan or an image such as the receipt of wages, invoices, contracts, liquidation of investments or affidavits of personal assets. Choose the file and click on next.
ca_tutorial_modal.p17: Last step is to wait for account validation, it may take up to 4 days.
ca_tutorial_modal.p18: In case of any error or missing information, Bitex will contact you through the email with which you registered. Stay tuned to this medium.
ca_tutorial_modal.p19: When the account is approved you can make transfers in pesos or dollars to your account to buy BTC (Bitcoins)
ca_tutorial_modal.p20: If you have any doubt, please contact us.
ca_tutorial_modal.t3: How to transfer money to your Bitex Account
ca_tutorial_modal.p21: In order to acquire Bitcoins, the first thing you must do is transfer fiduciary money to your Bitex account.
ca_tutorial_modal.p22: Open your favorite browser and go to
ca_tutorial_modal.p24: Note: if you have problems with loading the data in the form, enter bitex from another browser, such as Edge, Chrome or FireFox.
ca_tutorial_modal.p25: Once in your account click on deposit funds in my account
ca_tutorial_modal.p26: Click on load USD or ARG
ca_tutorial_modal.p27: Bitex will provide you with the information so you can make the transfer from your homebanking, depending on your country of origin and the currency you have chosen
ca_tutorial_modal.p28: From your homebanking do the transfer to be credited to your bitex account, you will receive an email from your bank with the transfer notice.
ca_tutorial_modal.p29: You will also receive an email from Bitex, informing you that the transfer is in process, remember that this may take up to 72 hours. If after 72 business hours have not yet credited your deposit, contact Bitex.
ca_tutorial_modal.p30: Once the balance is credited to your account, Bitex will send you an email informing you that the balance has been charged to your account.
ca_tutorial_modal.p31: Bitex will send you one last email with the invoice, terms and conditions and the detail of the operation
ca_tutorial_modal.p32: If you have any doubt, please contact us.
ca_tutorial_modal.t4: How to Buy Bitcoins in Bitex
ca_tutorial_modal.p33: Once the balance is credited to your bitex account, you can buy your Bitcoins at the best market price
ca_tutorial_modal.p34: To do this go to your bitex account and click on “Exchange”
ca_tutorial_modal.p35: Within the exchange you will see the balance of your account, in the fiduciary currency that you have chosen (we will assume that you transferred USD), click on buy BTC
ca_tutorial_modal.p36: Then you must enter the amount of USD you want to sell and the price you are going to pay to buy your BTC.
ca_tutorial_modal.p37: Note: If you have dollars in your account we recommend you click on the best price. In case you have entered Argentine pesos, take the orders that are on the ask list.
ca_tutorial_modal.p38: You will receive an email with the status of the transaction in process. When you have the BTC in your account, Bitex will contact you.

extract_tutorial_modal.t1: ¿Como pasar los fondos que opera WCS a BTC?
extract_tutorial_modal.p1: Para que puedas pasar el total de la cartera que opera WCS de tu cuenta de Binance a BTC debes seleccionar el fondo:
extract_tutorial_modal.p3: Ahora debes seleccionar BTC y presionar Cambiar
extract_tutorial_modal.p5: y listo, comprueba en tu cuenta de Binance que el balance está en la crypto que seleccionaste.
extract_tutorial_modal.t2: Transferir tus BTC de Binance a Bitex
extract_tutorial_modal.p6: Abre tu navegador favorito e ingresa a:
extract_tutorial_modal.p8: Nota: si tiene inconvenientes con la carga de los datos en el formulario ingresa a Bitex con otro navegador como Edge, Chrome o FireFox.
extract_tutorial_modal.p10: Ingresa los datos de autenticación de google
extract_tutorial_modal.p11: Una vez en tu cuenta haz clic sobre el icono de saldos.
extract_tutorial_modal.p13: Bitex mostrará tu dirección de BTC para que transfieras tus BTC que tienes en Binance. Copia o scanea el codigo QR.
extract_tutorial_modal.p14: Abre tu navegador favorito e ingresa a:
extract_tutorial_modal.p15: Ingresa a tu cuenta y haz clic en monedo (lo encontrarás en el margen superior derecho), en la lista que se despliega haz clic en retirar
extract_tutorial_modal.p16: En donde dice “Dirección BTC del destinatario”, pega tu dirección de BTC de Bitex y luego ingresa la cantidad que quieres transferir. Haz clic en envia
extract_tutorial_modal.p17: Binance te pedirá que ingreses el código de autenticación de google
extract_tutorial_modal.p18: Luego te enviará un e-mail para que confirmes el retiro.
extract_tutorial_modal.p19: Ve a tu cuenta de e-mail y haz clic en “Confirm withdrawal”
extract_tutorial_modal.p20: Se abrirá una pantalla donde te informará si todo salió bien.
extract_tutorial_modal.p21: Nota: Ten en cuenta que esta transacción puede demorar unas horas.
extract_tutorial_modal.p22: Ingresa a tu navegador favorito e ingresa a:
extract_tutorial_modal.p23: Haz clic en ingresar tus datos
extract_tutorial_modal.p24: Ingresa el código de google autenticación
extract_tutorial_modal.p25: Una vez dentro de tu cuenta, haz clic en Exchange
extract_tutorial_modal.p26: Haz clic en vender para vender los BTC que tienes en tu cuenta y recibir USD
extract_tutorial_modal.p27: Ingresa la cantidad de BTC que quieres vender y el precio. Bitex recomienda ingresar el Mejor precio (puedes hacer clic en donde dice “Usar este precio”) y haz clic en vender.
extract_tutorial_modal.p28: Nota: Esta operación puede demorar unas horas. Recuerda que bitex opera de lunes a viernes de 9 a 17 hs.
extract_tutorial_modal.t5: Transferir USD a tu cuenta Bancaria
extract_tutorial_modal.p29: Ingresa a tu navegador favorito e ingresa a:
extract_tutorial_modal.p30: Haz clic en ingresar y completa tus datos
extract_tutorial_modal.p31: Ingresa el código de autenticación de google
extract_tutorial_modal.p32: Una vez que estés dentro de tu cuenta, haz clic en saldos
extract_tutorial_modal.p34: Selecciona dónde deseas recibir el dinero, haciendo clic sobre “tengo nuevas instrucciones”
extract_tutorial_modal.p35: Selecciona el país de tu cuenta bancaria
extract_tutorial_modal.p37: Luego completa todos los campos del formulario que se despliega
extract_tutorial_modal.p38: Por último haz clic en Descargar y bitex se comunicará
extract_tutorial_modal.p39: Nota: Recuerda que solo podemos realizar transferencias a cuentas que te pertenezcan a tí, no puedes realizar una extracción de bitex a una cuenta de terceros. Las extracciones se procesan de lunes a viernes en horario hábil. Los tipos de cambio de dólares a moneda local están sujetos a variaciones, para mitigarlas recomendamos solicitar tu retiro dentro de nuestros horarios de atención.
extract_tutorial_modal.p40: Una vez iniciada la transferencia suele llegar a destino dentro de las 48 horas hábiles, aunque puede tardar hasta 5 días. El costo de descargar saldo desde Bitex es de 0.5% y no incluye otros costos extra o impuestos que pudieran aplicar a tu retiro. Todos los costos asociados corren a tu cargo.

referrals_info.info_description1: Any user can invite other people to visit Xcapit, they just need to create an account and share their link within their referral panel.
referrals_info.info_description2: You will earn $ 10 (ten dollars) for each guest who activates an Advanced or Expert account, and you will earn $ 1 (one dollar) for each guest who activates an Explorer account. In either case, your guest must have an active account for more than 60 days.
referrals_info.info_description3: Within the app, in your referral panel, click Request a reward. We will contact you to coordinate the payment.
referrals_info.info_description4: Within the app in your referral panel you will see the list of active guests and a counter of the money you have earned.

referrals_tos.title: Bases y condiciones programa de referidos
referrals_tos.paragraph: Crypyolab s.a.s (en adelante, la “Empresa” o “Xcapit”) lanza el programa de referidos (en adelante, el “Programa de referidos”), cuyo alcance y requisitos está sujeto a las siguientes bases y condiciones (en adelante las “Bases"). Estas bases forman parte de los términos y condiciones generales de la plataforma, disponibles en https://app.xcapit.com/support/wallet-info, que son obligatorios y de carácter vinculante y el participante declara conocer y aceptar. En caso de eventuales discrepancias o conflictos entre ambos documentos, prevalecerán los términos y condiciones generales.
referrals_tos.subtitle_1: 1. Requisitos para participar en el programa de referidos
referrals_tos.paragraph_1: Los usuarios participantes del programa de referidos deberán ser (i) Personas físicas; (ii) Mayores de 18 años.
referrals_tos.paragraph_2: Todos los términos relacionados a la ejecución del programa de referidos están exclusivamente a cargo de la empresa, quien será el único responsable de la mecánica, control, pruebas, etc. de todo el proceso descrito en las bases. En caso de que la empresa detecte o considere que un referente, en el marco del programa de referidos, cometió o comete actos fraudulentos en detrimento de la empresa y/o terceros, la empresa se reserva el derecho de cerrar inmediatamente la cuenta de dicho referente. El email asociado al referente mencionado permanecerá bloqueado, por lo que no podrá crearse una cuenta con dicha dirección de email. La información asociada a ese email permanecerá almacenada según lo establecido en la política de privacidad, disponible en https://www.xcapit.com/terminos.
referrals_tos.paragraph_3: El programa de referidos tendrá una vigencia desde el 12 de noviembre de 2021 y finaliza el día 31 de diciembre de 2021.
referrals_tos.subtitle_4: 4. Procedimiento para participar del programa de referidos
referrals_tos.paragraph_4:
4.a. El referente deberá descargar la app de Xcapit, registrarse con un mail, validar la cuenta y crear su wallet. al momento de crear la misma, el referente tendrá la opción de “copiar” el link para referir. (el “link”).
4.b. El referente podrá enviar el link: a través de whatsapp, correo electrónico, twitter, facebook, linkedin y cualquier otro canal que este considere.
4.c. A medida que más y más contactos referidos se descarguen la app de Xcapit y creen  la wallet, podrá ganar recompensas más emocionantes. Para constituir una referencia válida, sus contactos deben: 1) Registrarse en los servicios de la empresa con una dirección de correo electrónico válida y crear la wallet de xcapit, durante el período del concurso; cada recomendación válida que ud. haga le hará sumar 1 punto.
4.d. No hay límite para la cantidad de referencias que puede hacer por día durante el período del concurso.
4.e.Al referente se le asignará, un punto por cada referido que, a través del link del referente,descargue la app y cree la wallet de xcapit. el punto obtenido por cada referido que se registre no es transferible de ningún modo, ni por ningún motivo, ni negociable, y corresponde únicamente al email del referente que cumplió con el procedimiento establecido en la presente cláusula 4.
referrals_tos.paragraph_5: Los referidos pueden ser:  (i) Primarios: son aquellos referidos directos, es decir, que se registraron en la app. y crearon la wallet de xcapit con el link que el referente envío. por cada referido primario, ud. sumará 1 punto. (ii) Secundarios: Son aquellos que se registraron en la app. y crearon la wallet de xcapit, utilizando el link de sus referidos primarios. Por cada referido secundario, ud. sumará 0,5 puntos.
referrals_tos.paragraph_6: Esta sección solo se aplica a las partes recomendadas que califican para una recompensa. La empresa notificará a los referentes la cantidad de puntos obtenidos a través de pantalla de referidos que podrán visualizar desde la app. Cada punto equivale a 1 usd, y la misma se pagará en Matic. Dicha recompensa se podrá reclamar a partir de la fecha de finalización del programa de referidos (cláusula nº 3). Recibir una recompensa de cualquier tipo depende del cumplimiento de todos los requisitos y el cumplimiento de estas reglas. En el caso de que un destinatario de la recompensa sea descalificado por cualquier motivo, la empresa no está obligada a proporcionar una recompensa alternativa ni a extender el período del concurso de ninguna manera.
referrals_tos.paragraph_7: Como condición para participar en el programa de referidos, cada referente acepta que la empresa no será responsable por ningún daño directo ni indirecto que pudiere sufrir el referente y/o el referido y/o cualquier tercero con motivo y/u ocasión de la participación en el programa de referidos, y/o el uso, destino o finalidad del beneficio, renunciando la empresa a cualquier tipo de responsabilidad contractual y/o extracontractual frente al referente y/o el referido y/o cualesquier tercero, lo que es aceptado incondicionalmente por cada referente. la empresa renuncia a cualquier tipo de responsabilidad por cualquier omisión, inexactitud o error que pudiese sufrir esa plataforma con relación al programa de referidos.
referrals_tos.paragraph_8: Como condición para participar en el programa de referidos, cada referente acepta que la empresa no será responsable por ningún daño directo ni indirecto qLa empresa podrá modificar cualquiera de las cláusulas de estas bases en cualquier momento, sin previo aviso. el mismo hecho de participar en el programa de referidos implica el conocimiento y la aceptación plena de las bases y sus eventuales modificaciones, como así también los términos y condiciones generales del uso del sitio disponibles en /support/wallet-info/terms. Las decisiones de la empresa sobre todos y cada uno de los aspectos del programa de referidos, incluyendo decisiones por cualquier cuestión no prevista en las bases, serán definitivas e irrecurribles. La empresa se reserva el derecho de poner término o modificar al programa de referidos en caso de existir fraudes, dificultades técnicas o cualquier otro factor fuera de control de la empresa que pudiera comprometer la integridad del programa de referidos.
referrals_tos.paragraph_9: Como condición para participar en el programa, usted da su consentimiento para que la empresa obtenga y entregue su nombre, dirección y otra información a terceros con el fin de administrar este programa y cumplir con las leyes, regulaciones y reglas aplicables. cualquier información que proporcione al patrocinador puede usarse para comunicarse con usted en relación con este programa. La información enviada será tratada de acuerdo con la política de privacidad de la empresa.
referrals_tos.paragraph_10: Estas bases y el programa de referidos se gobiernan por las leyes de la república argentina. cualquier controversia derivada del presente acuerdo, su existencia, validez, interpretación, alcance o cumplimiento, será sometida a los tribunales competentes con sede en la ciudad autónoma de buenos aires.

notifications_list.title: You still have no notifications
notifications_list.message: Let's make this space come alive

disclaimer.title: Let's start with your wallet!
disclaimer.description: Before creating your wallet, verify the essential permissions to start
disclaimer.local_stored_keys_checkbox: I understand that my funds are kept safely within this device, and not by a company.
disclaimer.recovery_phrase_checkbox: I understand that if this application is moved to another device or removed, my funds can only be recovered with the recovery phrase.
disclaimer.terms_of_use_checkbox: I have read, understand and accept the terms of use.
disclaimer.error_did_not_accept: You need to check all the options to continue.

recovery_phrase_information.text1: Xcapit will never ask you to share your recovery phrase.
recovery_phrase_information.text2: The recovery phrase is the master key to your funds. Never share it with anybody.
recovery_phrase_information.text3: If you lose your recovery phrase, not even Xcapit will be able to recover your funds.

recovery_phrase_information_no_wallet.text1: You still do not have a recovery phrase.
recovery_phrase_information_no_wallet.text2: Create or import your wallet to be able to view it.
recovery_phrase_information_no_wallet.text3: As long as you have your 12 word phrase you will be able to recover your wallet and all your assets.

recovery_phrase_read.title: Recovery phrase
recovery_phrase_read.text: It's very important that you save your 12 words in a safe place and in the order that are shown.
recovery_phrase_read.coppied_text: The recovery phrase was copied to the clipboard
recovery_phrase_read.copy_error_text: The recovery phrase could not be coppied to the clipboard

subheader_component.title_without_wallet: You haven't created your wallet yet.

select_coin.title: Select assets
select_coin.subtitle: Choose the assets you want to view in your wallet
select_coin.recordatory: Remember that to operate on each network you must have its native currency.

success_creation.title: Nice! your wallet is now created and your recovery phrase is verified
success_creation.subtitle: Keep it in a safe place, if possible, without an internet connection

recovery_phrase.title: Recovery phrase
recovery_phrase.text1: These are the 12 words that make up your wallet.
recovery_phrase.text2: As long as you have the 12 words you will be able to recover your wallet and all the funds.
recovery_phrase.text3: If you lose the words you will not be able to do it.
recovery_phrase.text4: Carefully write each word in the order they appear and keep them in a safe place (text file, USB stick, by hand on a piece of paper, etc).

verify_phrase.title: Check your phrase
verify_phrase.text1: Tap the words in the corresponding order

create_password.title: Create a password
create_password.description: The password is used to make your wallet more secure, you can choose the same one that you use for the Xcapit app. In the event that you forget to retrieve it, recover your wallet with the 12 words.

receive.title: Your wallet information
receive.disclaimer_header: Send only {{currency}} ({{network}}) to this deposit address.
receive.disclaimer_body: Sending other coins or tokens to this address other than {{currency}} ({{network}}) may result in the loss of your deposit.

failed_mnemonic.title: Your recovery phrase is wrong
failed_mnemonic.description: We will generate another 12 words for greater security. Remember that you have to write them down and keep them in a safe place.

recovery_wallet.title: Enter recovery phrase
recovery_wallet.subtitle: Write your words separated by a space
recovery_wallet.label: Recovery phrase

network_select.title: Network
network_select.disclaimer:
Make sure the destination wallet uses the same network as {{network}} at this shipping address.
Sending other coins or tokens to an address other than {{network}} may result in the loss of your deposit.
 Currently only tokens can be sent through its native network, we are working to add more and new networks.

new_apikeys.slide3_text: Now copy the 18 digits of your Key
new_apikeys.slide4_text1: Together with the creation of your API Key, binance generated a "SECRET Key" to ensure the security of transactions (you can find it just below the API Key).

register.label_alias: Enter Alias (You can use the same as binance)

register_success_begginer.textPrimary: You have linked your account with Binance!

register_success.textPrimary: Your account is now linked to Binace!
register_success.textSecondary: We can start mananging your capital in Binance.

register_success_beginner.textPrimary: You have linked your account with Binance!
register_success_beginner.textSecondary: Choose the strategy that better suits you or start buying cryptocurrencies.

tutorial_apikeys.title: Associate an external management key (API key)
tutorial_apikeys.text_before: The API Key is a code that will allow us to manage your Binance account.
tutorial_apikeys.text_before_2: Login from a computer to your www.binance.com account and follow these steps to create a new API Key.
tutorial_apikeys.step2: Write an "Identification label for the API key" and click "Create API",.
tutorial_apikeys.step3: Scan the data with QR or enter it manually.

errors.noContent: The QR code has no content.
errors.permissionDenied: We can't access to the camera. Permission denied.

insert_key.title: Enter your API Key
insert_key.text_before: Copy the 18 digits of the API Key you created. Remember that we will not have permission to withdraw money, we can only operate.

insert_secret.title: Enter your Secret Key
insert_secret.text_before: Together with the creation of your API Key, Binance generated a "Secret Key" for security reasons. You can find it just below the API Key.
insert_secret.text_help: Remember that, for your safety, we will only have permits to operate on your capital but we will not be able to make withdrawals.

success_apikeys.textPrimary: ¡You have already linked your account with Binance!
success_apikeys.textSecondary: We are able to create a fund to start managing your investment.

success_apikeys_edition.textPrimary: We have modified your API Key!

edit_modal.title: Change Alias
edit_modal.description: The alias is a name for you to identify which Binance API key the funds belong to..

qr_scanner.title: Point the camera at the QR code
qr_scanner.text: Point your camera towards a QR code.

exchange_information.title: Binance is our Partner and the largest exchange in the world
exchange_information.description: Every investment you make in Xcapit needs to connect to a unique Binance API. But first step by step choose:

have_exchange_account.title: I already have a Binance account
have_exchange_account.description: If you already have a Binance account, let's go to the next step.

dont_have_exchange_account.title: I don't have a Binance account
dont_have_exchange_account.description: We tell you how to create a free account in the largest exchange in the world.

exchange_information.information_card: Remember that for your safety, we will only have permits to operate on the total of your capital in the Spot wallet. We will not be able to make withdrawals.

apikey_information.title: An API key is used to connect your Binance account with Xcapit
apikey_information.description: The API Key is a code that only allows us to manage your account. You must create it for it to exist.

have_apikey.title: I already have API Key
have_apikey.description: If you have already created your API Key with Binance, let's go to the next step.

dont_have_apikey.title: I don't have an API Key
dont_have_apikey.description: If you never created an API Key, we can help you create one.

tutorial_modal.title: Create API Key
tutorial_modal.text1: Go to Binance web page using a computer.
tutorial_modal.text2: Once you are logged in, go to your Binance profile and select “API Management”.
tutorial_modal.text3: Assign an identification label. This is just a name so you can recognize the API.
tutorial_modal.text4: Check the “Enable spot trading” option. This action allows us to operate, we can't operate if you disable it.

whats_an_api_key.title: What is an API key?
whats_an_api_key.description: An API key is a secret key that can be used to link your Binance account with Xcapit. In doing so you only give us permission to manage your cryptocurrencies but we can't take them out from your account. They are always under your control.

how_create_binance_account.title: How to create an account on Binance
how_create_binance_account.text2: 2. Create an account using your email.
how_create_binance_account.text3: 3. Verify your account so you can use it safely.

deposit_currency.title: In what currency will you pay the commission?
deposit_currency.text_before: Choose the currency with which you want to make the deposit

deposit_address.title: Address info
deposit_address.text_before: Use any of the following information to make the deposit
deposit_address.copy_address_ok_text: The address was copied to the clipboard
deposit_address.copy_address_error_text: The address could not be copied to the clipboard

fiat_success.textSecondary: To continue you need to transfer from your bank to the following data:
fiat_success.info_telegram: If you have any questions, you can contact Kripton through Telegram:
fiat_success.info_email: *The provider will email you when the process advances.

information_paxful.title: Buy BTC with Paxful:
information_paxful.subtitle: Paxful will allow you to buy only BTC. We will redirect you to their page to make the P2P purchase. Make sure you understand the following points before making a transaction:
information_paxful.recordatory_1: I understand that from this moment the operation will continue with the selected provider. Xcapit is not responsible for incorrect prices in the values ​​or currencies defined hereinafter, nor for prejudices that may arise with the interaction with the provider.
information_paxful.recordatory_2: I understand that the seller sets their own BTC price based on speed, privacy, and convenience. Rates may vary depending on the method of payment.
information_paxful.recordatory_3: I understand that there will be a network fee to send the BTC to my Binance wallet. It is recommended to add to your purchase as max 0.0566USD to cover the network fee, otherwise the purchase will remain in your Paxful wallet.
information_paxful.recordatory_4: Remember that if you have active investments, your purchase will automatically be part of that investment.
information_paxful.modal_content: Please check the points to consider before making a purchase

ramp_initial.title: New operation
ramp_initial.operation: What operation do you want to do?
ramp_initial.pair_buy: What currency do you want to buy?
ramp_initial.pair_sell: What currency do you want to sell?

register.description_bank: Complete your bank details with which you will operate with the provider
register.description_images: Upload the following images to finish the registration.

confirm.title: Check that the data is correct:
confirm.disclaimer: From this moment the operation will continue with the selected provider. Xcapit is not responsible for incorrect prices in the values ​​or currencies defined hereinafter, nor for prejudices that may arise with the interaction with the provider.

paxful.title: Buy BTC with Paxful
paxful.text: Paxful will only let you buy BTC. We will redirect you to Paxful's page to complete the transaction.
